title: Klaviyo - Marketing Overview
description: This Dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of Klaviyo marketing events

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your email marketing performance by monitoring Klaviyo Marketing events with this dashboard.

The events, which include the byproduct of flows, fall into Klaviyo metric categories such as Bounced Email, Clicked Email, Sent SMS, Failed to Deliver SMS, and more.

Use the `campaign_name` and 'flow_name` template variables to restrict data to a subset of campaigns or flows.

Email events categorize the deliverability of the email as well as click activity within the opened email.

See the [description of email deliverability](https://help.klaviyo.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000201131).
Opened and Clicked Email percentages are calculated by comparing the volume of Opened and Clicked Email compared to Received Email **within the same time span of the dashboard view**.

definition.title: Email Event Trends: Spam, Bounces, and Unsubscribes

search.query: source:klaviyo service:marketing-events @metric_name:("Bounced Email" OR "Dropped Email" OR "Received Email") $campaign_name $flow_name

definition.title: Top Campaigns for Soft Bounced Email Events
Top Campaigns for Hard Bounced Email Events
Top Campaigns for Spam Email Events

definition.content:
Shown here are marketing events associated with Klaviyo Flows. Flows are triggered by conditions such as eCommerce events and this display can aid in understanding the comparative volume among active flows.

See the [Klaviyo documentation](https://help.klaviyo.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002779351) describing per-flow analytics.

search.query: source:klaviyo service:marketing-events @metric_name:("Dropped Email" OR "Bounced Email" OR "Failed to Deliver SMS") $campaign_name $flow_name

definition.content:
SMS events are categorized by submission and receipt activity. Received SMS represents outbound SMS receipt while Sent SMS is when a user sends you an inbound message.

See the [SMS event descriptions](https://help.klaviyo.com/hc/en-us/articles/360035345572).

search.query: source:klaviyo service:marketing-events @metric_name:"Failed to Deliver Automated Response SMS" $campaign_name $flow_name

definition.title: SMS Trends: Delivery Failures and Unsubscribes

search.query: source:klaviyo service:marketing-events @metric_name:("Failed to Deliver SMS" OR "Received SMS") $campaign_name $flow_name

definition.content:
All Klaviyo events reference a metric name. The metric name falls into either the _marketing-events_, _ecommerce-events_, or _other-events_ service, or category.

If an accumulation of _other-events_ appears in this list, then Datadog can be contacted to consider defining a separate service type to more effectively display the event data.
